Package chat.ejb.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountService
    This interface provides functionality associated with user account data.
    ChatRoomService
    This chat room service interface provides the functionality for managing chat room data.
    FileHandlingService
    This interface contains methods for handling file read and write operations.
    UserService
    This interface provides the functionality for operations concerning users of the Enterprise WebSocket Chat application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountServiceImpl
    This AccountService implementation provides functionality to handle user account data.
    ApplicationInitializer
    This singleton performs essential functions on start up of the application.
    ChatRoomServiceImpl
    This chat room service implementation provides the functionality for managing chat room data.
    DailyRecorder
    This singleton session bean contains the functionality for scheduled daily recording of chat messages.
    ImageHandlingService
    This file handling service implementation contains functionality for handling read and write operations for image files.
    UserServiceImpl
    This UserService implementation provides the functionality for operations concerning users of the Enterprise WebSocket Chat application.
    VideoHandlingService
    This file handling service implementation contains functionality for handling read and write operations for video files.
